title: Catan
description: A game of trading and building on the island of Catan. Players collect resources and use them to build roads, settlements, and cities to earn points.

title: Pandemic
description: A cooperative game where players work as a team to stop global outbreaks of diseases by finding cures before time runs out.

title: Gloomhaven
description: A game of tactical combat in a unique medieval dark fantasy universe. Players take on the role of adventurers with their own special skills and motives.
